item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! My name is Hutton and I am 19 years old currently living in Seattle, WA. I love to build software with a focus on low level computing. Topics like OS development, compilers, programming languages, and x86 assembly pique my interest. However, I’m interested in everything computing related from hardware to AI/ML, so nothing gets left out. Work I am currently interning at MATRIXX Software where I’ve been doing a bit of everything over the past 11 months.
